Just a post to test if relative links still end up in the rss feed.

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(diamonds) +
  stat_density_2d(aes(x = x, y = depth, fill = stat(nlevel)), 
                  geom = "polygon", n = 100, bins = 10, contour = TRUE) +
  facet_wrap(clarity ~ .) +
  scale_fill_viridis_c(option = "A")
```
